Space Horse: What. The. Fuck
Doctor: Hello Space Horse
Space Horse: Who is Space Horse? I'm Keith from Slough
Doctor: I hate to tell you this, but you were in a major car accident, however we have performed life saving surgery, with one implication
Space Horse: What implication?
Doctor: You're a horse
Space Horse was in shock. How was he a horse? Where is he? Sure technology was advanced but he never knew of someone becoming a horse?!
As Space Horse slept, the doctor had a worrying realisation
Doctor: When transferring Space Horse's brain to his new body, I accidentally transferred the horse brain to a human...
Doctor: Space Horse, I have a mission for you
Space Horse: What do you mean a fucking mission? I'm not some 007 shit, I'm KEITH from SLOUGH

Doctor: I accidentally gave your old body a horse brain, and this human used his new opposable thumbs to start one of two time machines and is now causing trouble all across history by leaving items from our time period to stop these historic moments in time. Your mission is to go and stop him by collecting these items.
Doctor: However, he did break our other time machine, but I believe the parts are scattered around this hospital room to rebuild it! Best of luck!
Diplodocus: Hello there, I am Duchess Diplodocus! How may I help you dear today?
Space Horse: Uhh, have you seen a human round here recently?
Diplodocus: What's a human?
Space Horse: Walks on two legs, has arms, pretty short?
Diplodocus: All I know similiar to that is a stenonychosaurus
Space Horse: Yeh sure
Diplodocus: Well yes then! There was one here earlier, though it made a very weird, un-stenonychosaurus like noise
Space Horse: What sort of noise?
Diplodocus: NEIGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Space Horse: Uh yeh, that's the guy I'm looking for? Did he do anything weird?
Diplodocus: He dropped something the started attracting all the rocks, and something that looked like a carved stick
Space Horse: Okay, I'll have a search around
Triceratops: ROAR roar roar
Space Horse: What the fuck, I can't communicate to this guy
Triceratops: Jokes on you fam, I can speak yo language
Space Horse: Oh haha, funny
Triceratops: Innit bruv, what you doing down these ends
Space Horse: I still can't communicate with you
Triceratops: Alright, alright, allow it. Who the hell are you?
Space Horse: Uh I'm a horse? Have you seen any weird things around recently?
Triceratops: Yeh, this well weird fucker dropped some expanding thing over there somewhere
Space Horse: Okay thanks!
